about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm a passionate frontend developer with expertise in modern web technologies and a love for creating beautiful, functional user experiences.

whoAmI.title: Who Am I?
whoAmI.description: I'm a frontend developer passionate about creating modern, responsive web applications. I love working with React, TypeScript, and modern CSS frameworks to build user-friendly interfaces.

whatIDo.title: What I Do
whatIDo.webDevDescription: Creating modern, responsive websites and web applications using the latest technologies.
whatIDo.optimizationDescription: Ensuring fast loading times and smooth interactions for the best user experience.

myApproach.title: My Approach
myApproach.description: I focus on writing clean, maintainable code while ensuring excellent user experience. I believe in continuous learning and staying updated with the latest web development trends and best practices.

projects.title: My Projects
projects.description: Here are some of my recent projects that showcase my skills and passion for frontend development.
projects.noProjects: No projects found in this category.
projects.tryDifferent: Try selecting a different category to see more projects.

weatherDashboard.title: Weather Dashboard
weatherDashboard.description: A responsive weather dashboard with location-based forecasts, interactive maps, and beautiful data visualizations.

portfolioWebsite.title: Portfolio Website V1
portfolioWebsite.description: A responsive portfolio website with smooth animations, dark mode support, and modern design patterns.

xabPlanner.title: XabPlanner
xabPlanner.description: A comprehensive task management and planning application with intuitive interface, project organization, and productivity features.

instrumentPro.title: Instrument Pro
instrumentPro.description: A modern e-commerce platform for tools and instruments with product catalog, shopping cart, user authentication, and payment processing.

turtleSource.title: TurtleSource Team
turtleSource.description: A professional portfolio website for my freelance development team showcasing services, team members, and completed projects.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: I'm always open to discussing new opportunities and exciting projects. Let's create something amazing together!

form.title: Send Me a Message
form.name: Name
form.success: Message sent successfully! I'll get back to you soon.

footer.madeWith: Made with ❤️ using React & Tailwind CSS
